name: ss2_dec_graphics
description: SS2 (ESC N) temporarily shifts to G2 charset for one character, then reverts
comment: Designate G2=DEC Graphics (ESC * 0). Print 'A' (ASCII, via G0). SS2 (ESC N). Print 'q' → translated via G2 DEC Graphics to U+2500 (─). Print 'B' (back to G0 ASCII). Result: A─B at (0,0)-(0,2).
